pages.text: MineColonies lets you build and manage your own thriving colony. $(br2)Lead your settlers, assign jobs, and grow your town into a bustling city!

Start by placing a Supply Camp or Ship to get initial resources. $(br2)Then, craft a Town Hall and place it to establish the center of your colony. $(br2)Recruit citizens, assign them jobs, and begin building your colony with specialized structures.

Expand your colony by constructing new buildings like the Builder's Hut, Barracks, and Farm. $(br2)Train Guards to protect your citizens, and set up Deliverymen to automate resource transport. $(br2)With careful planning and management, your colony will prosper!
